description: Deletes a data source in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the data source is deleted.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the data source that is deleted.

nested_items.name: assetFormsOutput
nested_items.description: The asset data forms associated with this data source.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: formName
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The revision of the metadata form type.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the data source that is deleted.

nested_items.name: glueRunConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of the Amazon Web Services Glue data source.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID included in the configuration details of the Amazon Web Services Glue data source.

nested_items.name: autoImportDataQualityResult
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to automatically import data quality metrics as part of the data source run.

nested_items.name: catalogName
nested_items.description: The catalog name in the Amazon Web Services Glue run configuration.

nested_items.name: dataAccessRole
nested_items.description: The data access role included in the configuration details of the Amazon Web Services Glue data source.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services region included in the configuration details of the Amazon Web Services Glue data source.

nested_items.name: relationalFilterConfigurations
nested_items.description: The relational filter configurations included in the configuration details of the Amazon Web Services Glue data source.

nested_items.name: databaseName
nested_items.description: The database name specified in the relational filter configuration for the data source.

nested_items.name: filterExpressions
nested_items.description: The filter expressions specified in the relational filter configuration for the data source.

nested_items.name: expression
nested_items.description: The search filter expression.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The search filter explresison type.

nested_items.name: schemaName
nested_items.description: The schema name specified in the relational filter configuration for the data source.

nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account included in the configuration details of the Amazon Redshift data source.

nested_items.description: The data access role included in the configuration details of the Amazon Redshift data source.

nested_items.description: The ID of the connection that is deleted.

nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the data source is deleted.

nested_items.description: The enable setting of the data source that specifies whether the data source is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.description: The ID of the environemnt associated with this data source.

nested_items.description: The ID of the project in which this data source exists and from which it's deleted.

nested_items.name: publishOnImport
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the assets that this data source creates in the inventory are to be also automatically published to the catalog.

nested_items.description: Specifies that the granted permissions are retained in case of a self-subscribe functionality failure for a data source.
